author: Simon Difford
description: The citrus hints in the kiwi combine brilliantly with those in the gin and fresh lemon juice.
name: Kee-Wee Martini

recipeInstructions.text: Cut kiwi fruit in half, scoop out flesh into base of shaker and MUDDLE
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
